edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.users

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDaoImpl

    public interface UserDao
    DAO interface class for User Entity bean; provides access methods for User entity retrievals
    Author:
    Pramod R. Khare

      • getUserByIdWithAllocatedEvaluatorsMappings

        User getUserByIdWithAllocatedEvaluatorsMappings(Long userId)
        Get user by its user-id along with his allocated evaluators mappings; i.e. All evaluators who will be grading this user's submissions - UserToReviewerMapping contains details about which document, for which member and by which reviewer user.
        Parameters:
        userId -
        Returns:

      • getUserByIdWithSubmittersToEvaluateMappings

        User getUserByIdWithSubmittersToEvaluateMappings(Long userId)
        Get user by its user-id along with all his allocated submitters to evaluate; i.e. All submitters whom this user will be grading i.e. UserToReviewerMapping contains details about which document, for which member and by which submitter user.
        Parameters:
        userId -
        Returns:
